summary: Frontend i18n and zoom pan gesture bug fixes verified - All critical translations working correctly in Portuguese
critical_code_review_comments: i18n implementation uses useEffect with navigation.setOptions() to set dynamic titles - this is the correct pattern for React Navigation
Language persistence uses localStorage on web and AsyncStorage on native - works correctly
Zoom pan gesture has minDistance:15 which prevents jumps when placing arrows near existing ones
seed_data_creation: Created test bow 'Arco de Teste' for session testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: i18n translations verified working for Home, Settings, Session Setup, Scoring, and Summary screens. Modal buttons (Save/Discard/Cancel) translate correctly. Zoom pan gesture fix with minDistance:15 is in place. Testing was done on Expo web version at https://i18n-release.preview.emergentagent.com
